title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added a new known issue to GitHub Enterprise Server 3.16.6 and 3.17.3 release notes.
Warns high-scale customers about potential performance degradation during upgrades, including slow response times, queue spikes, high CPU usage, and increased MySQL load.
Includes a cautionary note to upgrade carefully and adds an update timestamp (2025-07-23).
